document.full_text: the united nations is negotiating with libya's government, rebels and nato to stop fighting for 24 to 72 hours to allow food and medical supplies to reach civilians, especially in the west, its envoy said on wednesday.
document.title: u.n. seeks deal to allow food, medicine into libya
lines_and_colors: the united nations is negotiating with libya's government, rebels and nato to stop fighting for 24 to 72 hours to allow food and medical supplies to reach civilians, especially in the west, its envoy said on wednesday.
